title: Takashi Sakurai
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Sakurai was born in <a href="Shizuoka%20Prefecture">Shizuoka Prefecture</a> on May 4, 1977. After graduating from <a href="Shizuoka%20Gakuen%20High%20School">Shizuoka Gakuen High School</a>, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Yokohama%20Fl%C3%BCgels">Yokohama Flügels</a> in 1996. He also played Argentine club <a href="Club%20de%20Gimnasia%20y%20Esgrima%20La%20Plata">Gimnasia y Esgrima La Plata</a> from 1996 to 1997. However he could hardly play in the match until 1998. Yokohama Flügels was disbanded end of 1998 season due to financial strain, he moved to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Hokkaido%20Consadole%20Sapporo">Consadole Sapporo</a> in 1999. He played several matches in 2 seasons and he retired end of 2000 season.
